Ashley Preston
Hair Design

Services Offered

Ashley offers a strong consultative approach, listening to the needs and desires of each client so she can advise them on how to achieve their best hair. She has mastered the art behind each hair type and texture so that she can teach her clientele to improve and maintain the health of their hair.
